morning: In the morning we woke up at 7 am and got ready to go to the breakfast buffet.we quickly got a few plates filled with all their delicious food before we went back upstairs to pack our bags and everything thing else so we would be very organised and not forget anything. Finally  when we were done we headed downstairs to the reception to check out then got a few taxis to drop us off at the airport which took one hour to get there.
title: Fly to Hội An
